tool_description: Generates, manages, and tracks promotional codes for discount campaigns including unique code creation, usage limits, and redemption monitoring.

campaign_id.description: Campaign identifier to create codes for

code_type.description: Type of code: single_use, multi_use, unique_per_customer

expiration_datetime.description: Code expiration date and time in ISO 8601 format

error_messages: Invalid campaign ID: Campaign not found in system.
Invalid code type: Use one of [single_use, multi_use, unique_per_customer].
Invalid number of codes: number_of_codes must be between 1 and 10000.
Invalid expiration datetime: Use ISO 8601 format and future date.
Code generation failed: Unable to generate unique codes with specified parameters.
usage: Provide campaign_id and code_type. Optionally specify code_prefix, number_of_codes, and expiration_datetime. Returns generated promotional codes and tracking information.

codes_created.description: Total number of codes successfully created
